page.title: 09RECREATION
page.content: Members of Dalbeattie Angling Club are allowed to fish in the river Urr for salmon from 25th February until 30th November and trout from 15th March until 6th October.They also sell permits to visitors on a daily,weekly or seasonal basis.The fishing takes place mainly above Buittle Bridge as the water is tidal below this point and is not so good for fishing.This part of the river belongs to Munches Estate to which the club pays an annual hire fee.The club also has loch fishing in ather parts of the area. They hold competions ocassionally.
